title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day with 11 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street, following a blue car and passing a parked truck. It slows down and stops at a red light.

reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed, following the blue car ahead. It slows down and stops at the red light, checking for oncoming traffic before proceeding. The parked truck on the right side of the road poses no immediate danger, but the ego vehicle should remain vigilant for any sudden movements or pedestrians crossing the street.
